item.description:
Join us for dimsum this Saturday. We will go for a walk along the Greenway to the Waterfront after dimsum. For those of you that are new to Boston, this is a scenic & relaxing walk. Let's enjoy the dimsum, nice weather, fresh air, conversation and good company. This is also a good opportunity to take some pictures.

Parking is always tough to find in Chinatown. We recommend you take the T to dimsum. Please be on time so we can be seated promptly.

*As always - please update your RSVP if your plans change.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be near the front host stand & will provide a cell phone # so you can call/text us if needed.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum and Walk
